form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/10/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service 70 COLUMBUS AVENUE, NEW YORK 23, N. Y. (Office) File No.: All 579 353 R/ms Date: March 2, 1959 TO: Mr. Anwar 118 West 87th Street New York 24, N.Y. TO: Bibi Choudhry 25 Mexfield Road London SW-15, England Dear Sir or Madam: The records of this office show that Bibi Choudhry was admitted to the United States as a temporary visitor and the period of temporary admission has ex- pired. As this office has no record of departure from the United States it appears that there may have been a failure to surrender the visitor's permit upon departure. 8Â° In order that the record in the case may be closed, will you kindly answer the questions on NAT the back of this form and: Return it in the attached self-addressed envelope. No postage is required if mailed anywhere in the United States. 11 SERVICES, Take it to the office of the American Consul at and ask him to return the letter to this office. Take the letter to the office of this Service at and ask the Officer in Charge to return it to this office. Sincerely, av W.7. Flagg Assistant District Director for Investigation? G-146 (Rev. 1-10-57)
